sentences.sContent: How can they justify paying such huge salaries?
sentences.sCn: 他们怎能证明付这么大笔薪金是正当的呢？

sentences.sContent: ...You justify carrying devices around the hospital to do medical records...

...There may be some matters of life and death, or highest principle, which might justify such a risk...

trans.tranOther: to show that sb/sth is right or reasonable
